Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; translations
_description: A translation of ‘O vos omnes’ (Lam. 1.12) — one couplet

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
Stand and behold euerj manyif þer be any swikl sorowe alse myn
                    al ane
BodLatTheD1.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 166.
